Hi - I'm Sam! 

I'm a scientific researcher currently working as a data science consultant in the pharmaceutical industry through [Hillman Analytics](https://www.hillmananalytics.com).

My background is in epidemiology, statistics, and complex data science. 

I have extensive experience working in data analysis, data science, and data management, and have previous experience working in clinical trials. Find out more about me and my work or [get in touch](contact.qmd)!
